metadata.title: CVE-2020-0452 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In exif_entry_get_value of exif-entry.c, there is a possible out of boundswrite due to an integer overflow. This could lead to remote code executionif a third party app used this library to process remote image data with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-8.1 Android-9 Android-10Android-11 Android-8.0Android ID: A-159625731

criterions.comment: libexif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
